price: Sema: Iaminini au msiiamini. Hakika wale walio pewa ilimu kabla yake, wanapo somewa hii, huanguka kifudifudi wanasujudu.
arabic: قُلۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِهِۦٓ أَوۡ لَا تُؤۡمِنُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦٓ إِذَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ يَخِرُّونَۤ لِلۡأَذۡقَانِۤ سُجَّدٗاۤ
footnotes: Waambie makafiri wa Makka kwa kuwatisha: Jichagulieni nafsi zenu mlitakalo - kuiamini Qur'ani au la! Kwani hakika walio pewa ilimu sawa na fahamu baraabara kabla ya kuteremka kwake, wakisomewa Qur'ani huangukia kwenye nyuso zao kwa kusujudu na kumshukuru Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul āminū bihi aw lā tu'minū inna alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma min qablihi idhā yut'lā ʿalayhim yakhirrūna lil'adhqāni sujjadan
